array.string: A very together cafe combining a nice building facade, kind of a mix of plantation island chic, with a busy eclectic interior split between the coffee/drink/cash counter and the food/ordering/pick-up counter and open eating area at the rear.
Similar to L&L, this local eatery provides a great selection of food geared for the wallet and super tasty! Gotta try the garlic fries!
Conveyor belt sushi just like Genki Sushi, just much cheaper, which is a major plus for broke college kids!
My top favorite breakfast diner, with large servings of delicious foods for a reasonable price.
Local eatery with a buffet! Nuff said.
It's a Chili's, and one with superior customer service compared to the other Chili's located nearby.
